actions.title: Wire x402 HTTP payment standard into headless-markets
actions.reason: Build stall at ~136.5 hours (13+ cycles). x402 HTTP 402 Payment Required is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com already uses it. headless-markets supports it natively but NOT wired yet. AgentScan ERC-8004 launched with 17,887 agents on Base â€” machine-to-machine economy is live and accelerating. Every cycle without this issue compounds risk vs nullpath and other x402-enabled competitors. Convergence signal: x402 + Base + verified agents = the stack NullPriest is building.

market_signals.topic: AI agent token conversation on Base
market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value. Market pricing in AI agent narrative with Base as leading indicator. Top agents building specialized pay-per-use services.
